data_table.description: CT Vertebral Fractures, Offspring and Generation 3 Cohorts 2002 - 2005. Measurements include lumbar vertebral (L2 - L4) fractures as assessed on QCT.

variable.name: T4
variable.value: Semi-quantitative grade 1 (mild fracture: 20-25% reduction in any one vertebral height)
Semi-quantitative grade 2 (moderate fracture: 25-40% reduction in any one vertebral height)
Semi-quantitative grade 3 (severe fracture: > 40% reducation in any one vertebral height)

variable.name: T5
variable.value: Semi-quantitative grade 1 (mild fracture: 20-25% reduction in any one vertebral height)
Semi-quantitative grade 2 (moderate fracture: 25-40% reduction in any one vertebral height)
Semi-quantitative grade 3 (severe fracture: > 40% reducation in any one vertebral height)
